Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Entrance of the Lord Christ into the Land of Egypt:

Text.Language: Rasi yel/l w~ niremn~,/mi: nem necyws t/rou: je afi~ saro n~je pimairwmi: v/etsop qajwou n~nie~wn t/rou.
Rejoice and be glad, O Egypt: and all her borders: for unto you came the Lover of Mankind: who was before all ages.
